/* StndPiMap.SelectStndPiList 스텐드파이프 목록*/
WITH C AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROWCNT FROM INFOFMS.WTL_STPI_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.IST_YMD >= #IST_YMD_FROM#
A.IST_YMD <= #IST_YMD_TO#
A.VAL_MOF = #VAL_MOF#
A.STP_MOP = #STP_MOP#
A.STD_DIP = #STD_DIP#
A.STP_ALT = #STP_ALT#
)
SELECT C.ROWCNT, X.* FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.FTR_IDN DESC ) AS RN , A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , A.IST_YMD , A.VAL_MOF , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250035' AND DTL_CD = A.VAL_MOF ) AS MOF_NAM , A.STP_MOP , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250102' AND DTL_CD = A.STP_MOP ) AS MOP_NAM , A.STD_DIP , A.STP_ALT , A.PRD_NAM , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , A.ANG_DIR , CASE WHEN ST_ISVALID(A.GEOM) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_GEOMETRY FROM INFOFMS.WTL_STPI_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.IST_YMD >= #IST_YMD_FROM#
A.IST_YMD <= #IST_YMD_TO#
A.VAL_MOF = #VAL_MOF#
A.STP_MOP = #STP_MOP#
A.STD_DIP = #STD_DIP#
A.STP_ALT = #STP_ALT#
ORDER BY FTR_IDN DESC
) X JOIN C ON 1=1 WHERE RN <= ($page$+1) * $rows$ AND RN >= ($page$) * $rows$ + 1

/* StndPiMap.SelectStndPiDtl 스텐드파이프 상세정보*/
SELECT A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , A.IST_YMD , A.VAL_MOF , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250035' AND DTL_CD = A.VAL_MOF ) AS MOF_NAM , A.STP_MOP , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250102' AND DTL_CD = A.STP_MOP ) AS MOP_NAM , A.STD_DIP , A.STP_ALT , A.PRD_NAM , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , A.ANG_DIR , decode(A.SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM FROM INFOFMS.WTL_STPI_PS A WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
statements.update:
INSERT INTO INFOFMS.WTL_STPI_PS ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , IST_YMD , VAL_MOF , STP_MOP , STD_DIP , STP_ALT , PRD_NAM , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , ANG_DIR
) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #IST_YMD# , #VAL_MOF# , #STP_MOP# , #STD_DIP# , #STP_ALT# , #PRD_NAM# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #ANG_DIR# )

/* 스텐드파이프 상세 수정 */ UPDATE INFOFMS.WTL_STPI_PS SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , IST_YMD = #IST_YMD# , VAL_MOF = #VAL_MOF# , STP_MOP = #STP_MOP# , STD_DIP = #STD_DIP# , STP_ALT = #STP_ALT# , PRD_NAM = #PRD_NAM# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , ANG_DIR = #ANG_DIR# WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#

MERGE INTO INFOFMS.WTL_STPI_PS USING DUAL ON (FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , IST_YMD = #IST_YMD# , VAL_MOF = #VAL_MOF# , STP_MOP = #STP_MOP# , STD_DIP = #STD_DIP# , STP_ALT = #STP_ALT# , PRD_NAM = #PRD_NAM# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , ANG_DIR = #ANG_DIR#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , IST_YMD , VAL_MOF , STP_MOP , STD_DIP , STP_ALT , PRD_NAM , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , ANG_DIR
) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #IST_YMD# , #VAL_MOF# , #STP_MOP# , #STD_DIP# , #STP_ALT# , #PRD_NAM# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #ANG_DIR# )
/* 스텐드파이프 상세 삭제 */ DELETE INFOFMS.WTL_STPI_PS WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
